mil7.3.9:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘kammakārassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.3.9:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, kammakāro evaṁ cintayati ‘bhatako ahaṁ imāya nāvāya kammaṁ karomi,
mil7.3.9:1.2_1: imāyāhaṁ nāvāya vāhasā bhattavetanaṁ labhāmi, na me pamādo karaṇīyo, appamādena me
mil7.3.9:1.3_0: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena evaṁ cintayitabbaṁ ‘imaṁ kho ahaṁ cātumahābhūtikaṁ
mil7.3.9:1.3_1: kāyaṁ sammasanto satataṁ samitaṁ appamatto upaṭṭhitassati sato sampajāno samāhito
mil7.3.9:1.4: Idaṁ, mahārāja, kammakārassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
